title: Doctours – Hair Transplants Made Easy
description:
Doctours is a marketplace where American patients can compare, book, and pay for hair transplants overseas! 

The best hair transplant clinics in the world aren't in the US. They are in countries overseas like Brazil, Greece, and Turkey where clinics do hair transplants every day. While this is good for the cost of the procedure, it's bad because it's making determining a good clinic from a bad clinic extremely hard. Doctours makes it easy.
